1353650.name: Elisius
1353650.description:
Survive or thrive in this fantasy land built by the ancient and mighty Time Lord. This mysterious entity has brought the greatest warriors from different periods on Earth to the realm of his creation, Elisius. He has provided them with various historical weapons and means to observe and study them for nefarious purposes. You are one of these warriors, and with up to 3 other friends, you must fight through these islands to gain more significant gold and weaponry.

The nature of Elisius grants every warrior special abilities, which let you harness the Time Lord's magic to access powers beyond your wildest dreams. Use the money earned from the islands to upgrade your weapons, gain prestige, and get new abilities. Whether destroying goblins as a Viking with a shotgun or slaying an orc with a stick, Elisius offers many strange and unique weapon and character combinations for you to dominate the arena with.

The land of Elisius is not forgiving, but the arena offers plenty of rewards for those who succeed, so go out and impress the Time Lord with your skill! It's not like you have another option...
1353650.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
